Class Backpack

java.lang.Object
modelisation.Backpack
public class Backpack extends Object
Represents the hero's backpack. It stores items arranged on a grid and handles placement rules.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Backpack()
    Creates the initial 5×3 backpack with empty cells.
